list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update Video component styles and workspace settings
Two adjustments were made in this commit. In the Video component, the styling of the video and scene elements was updated to provide better UI appearance. The maximum height attribute and additional styles were added. In the workspace.xml, the task and changelist were updated reflecting enhancements in the Video component rendering.

task.summary:
Add body tracking feature with TensorFlow and Three.js
This commit adds a body tracking feature to the application. This is accomplished by integrating TensorFlow and Three.js libraries. The tracking feature enables comparing user movements with professional athletes. Additionally, the project's metadata and dependencies in `package.json` have been updated accordingly.

Update format in workspace.xml
The changes in this commit replace <![CDATA[{ with { and " with " in the workspace.xml file. This change prevents any potential parse errors due to special characters.

Add human anatomy connections and improve rendering in Video component
This update reorganizes the video rendering code, defining the connections based on human anatomy at a higher scope for reusability. It further modifies the points to filter for a certain score threshold and changes the rendering from lines to tubes for improved visibility. Visual adjustments are also made in page.tsx and global.css files. Additionally, minor updates are made to workspace.xml.

Refactor and improve video component rendering
This commit refactors the rendering logic in the Video component by defining data and types with more precision. It enhances the drawing of poses by adopting a more error-tolerant approach. Furthermore, some CSS and workspace configurations were updated to accommodate these changes.

Update Video component styles and workspace settings
Two adjustments were made in this commit. In the Video component, the styling of the video and scene elements was updated to provide better UI appearance. The maximum height attribute and additional styles were added. In the workspace.xml, the task and changelist were updated reflecting enhancements in the Video component rendering.

MESSAGE.value:
Add body tracking feature with TensorFlow and Three.js
This commit adds a body tracking feature to the application. This is accomplished by integrating TensorFlow and Three.js libraries. The tracking feature enables comparing user movements with professional athletes. Additionally, the project's metadata and dependencies in `package.json` have been updated accordingly.

Update format in workspace.xml
The changes in this commit replace <![CDATA[{ with { and " with " in the workspace.xml file. This change prevents any potential parse errors due to special characters.

Add human anatomy connections and improve rendering in Video component
This update reorganizes the video rendering code, defining the connections based on human anatomy at a higher scope for reusability. It further modifies the points to filter for a certain score threshold and changes the rendering from lines to tubes for improved visibility. Visual adjustments are also made in page.tsx and global.css files. Additionally, minor updates are made to workspace.xml.

Refactor and improve video component rendering
This commit refactors the rendering logic in the Video component by defining data and types with more precision. It enhances the drawing of poses by adopting a more error-tolerant approach. Furthermore, some CSS and workspace configurations were updated to accommodate these changes.

Update Video component styles and workspace settings
Two adjustments were made in this commit. In the Video component, the styling of the video and scene elements was updated to provide better UI appearance. The maximum height attribute and additional styles were added. In the workspace.xml, the task and changelist were updated reflecting enhancements in the Video component rendering.
